description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. Break out with an exciting twist. A wide range of over 30 unique levels each including an unlockable pictures of me (Kitty). 3 powerups to help you clear the screen of those pesky blocks. Enjoy ;)  Music: Kevin MacLeod
